donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
-  Intensify, diversify and improve prevention services available nationwide, particularly for vulnerable and at-risk populations
- Consolidate achievements and extend the offering of high-quality comprehensive treatment services throughout the territory
- Strengthen the nationwide offering of long-lasting care/support/assistance services for all those in need
- Build national coordination and monitoring-evaluation capacities
